review: So glad i decided to make this purchase! I could sit here for hours on end playing with all its different features and games. Yes almost everygame clst money but just the same on any hand held device there are free games and paid ones. I love that there is no little piece of plastic at the end of it like there is on a TV remote so that you have to point it at the TV at the right angle. Its completely wireless and communicates with the TV through the little piece it comes with that goes into the TV. I could control iit with my hands under the blanker if i wanted. Its a very modernized device. My only complaint is that every movie it offers requires additional charges, although it does offer Netflix and i pay for Netflix monthly so that's not too much of an issue.
